name: CPRouteChoice
desc: A possible route for a trip.

items.name: var additionalInformationVariants: [String]?
items.desc: An array of variants providing additional information about the route choice.

items.desc: An array of selection summary variants.

items.name: var userInfo: Any?
items.desc: An object containing custom information associated with the route choice.
